Reviews.Title: works
Reviews.Author: TALLONE
Reviews.Content: not much to say about a power adapter--it was shipped in a plastic bag and a box in the bag--should have been the bag in a box,but what do I know.adapter works fine but I had to change the round plug due to my router takes a 3.5 mm end other than that all is well--watch your polarity when changing the ends

Reviews.Title: Nice power supply
Reviews.Author: Bass Trout Master
Reviews.Content: Using this for a LED baby's room night light.  I measured the ID and OD and it fit. It is definitely 5 volts DC.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and works great
Reviews.Author: J. Wagener
Reviews.Content: I used this to power my automatic cat feeder. Works as well and is much cheaper than the stock unit.

Reviews.Title: Works Fine
Reviews.Author: Wizzard "gwitte2"
Reviews.Content: My dog chewed the original equipment power supply cord.  This replacement works fine and the quality is also fine.  The price is very reasonable.  I recommend this power supply adapter - just be sure the connector and current rating of the device you want to charge is compatible.

Reviews.Title: Great adapter
Reviews.Author: S. Lewis
Reviews.Content: This little adapter was purchased for use with a clock radio. It wasn't compatible with the model I have, but I am sure it would work well for other models that it is compatible with.

Reviews.Title: Wrong size
Reviews.Author: Ghost
Reviews.Content: Like someone else on here commented.....it is not the correct size.  But it is not worth hassle to return.  I am very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Not as Pictured
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: The picture for this product is all wrong... it looks nothing like this... -2 starsThe cable on this product is extremely short... 4.5foot cable... I'll have to spend more just to get a power extension cable for my purposes... -1 star.

Reviews.Title: Wrong size
Reviews.Author: Pswpaw
Reviews.Content: The cord I received was the wrong size it was to big I need a smaller one,how do I get the size?

Reviews.Title: Adapter tip too large
Reviews.Author: Deborah Samuels
Reviews.Content: Not usable for small digital tv. Despite being the size needed per manufacturer, the adapter tip was too large. Not worth effort to return, though.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done.
Reviews.Author: Locomotion15
Reviews.Content: Pros: It works like it should.Cons: It gets in the way on power strips. Blocks two sockets to one side and one to the other. Putting it at the end of a power strip or in the wall solves most of this problem. Also has an annoying bright red light. This problem can be solved with a small piece of duck tape.Bottom line: Well, it does what it should and there is a way to get around any of the few problems. I would recommend for the price.

Reviews.Title: finally snes/nes
Reviews.Author: acacia
Reviews.Content: I lost a power supply to the retro snes/nes system and I found this online this came within a week after ordering it! I couldn't find it anywhere in a store so I just ordered it. No issues with the product or anything what so ever.

ProductInfo.Features:
Fully regulated 100V-240V can be used world wide
Input voltage: 100 ~ 240V (AC)
Output voltage: 5V (DC)
Output current: Maximum 1A
Output plug style: 5.5 * 2.1mm
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu AC 100-240V/DC 5V 1A Power Supply Adapter PW550 1MR
